content: throughout the whole mane cut the strands that sticks out and yarn this will make the hair look make it shorter in the neck much nicer and add more volume 18 mane and tail variant 2 use either one color or several like rainbow if you do a rainbow-unicorn in my unicorn example i used 5 different colors purple pink yellow green and blue make 36 chains start on the second chain from the hook and crochet back on the chain 35 single_crochet when you reached the last chain make 36 new chains and crochet 35 single_crochet back on the chain continue and repeat the pattern like this to you have as many strands as you want when you are done with each strand roll it in a spiral with your fingers if you like to make the strands more curly add some increases every second chain for example 1 single_crochet increase x 6 23 single_crochet the more increases you add the more curlier it will be in my example i made each color in 3 strands so it became total 15 strands for the tail i did 1 strands per color so it became total 5 strands if you using more than one color leave a long yarn tail after each color change when you sew the mane you will sew each color part with its own color sew the mane on the horse s head just behind the horn round 18 attach the tail between round 6 and 8 see final result on next page 19 mane and tail is done final look on the unicorn 20 congrats love horse is done thank you for making her please share your gorgeous work tag me on instagram @handmade_by_halime
